0000000001000000 //(movi)load data from Din to Reg0
0101010101010101 //input data for Reg0
0000000001001000 //(movi)Load data from Din to Reg1
1010101010101010 //input data for Reg1
0000000000010000 //mov Reg2, Reg0
0000000000000000 // blank 
0000000000011001 //mov Reg3, Reg1
0000000000000000
0000000010001000 //add Reg1, Reg0
0000000000000000
0000000000100001 //mov Reg4, Reg1
0000000000000000
0000000001101000 //movi Reg5, D
0000000011111111 //Data for Reg5
0000000011100101 //sub Reg4, Reg5
0000000000000000	
0000000000111101 //mov Reg7, Reg5
0000000000000000
0000000010110010 //add Reg6, Reg2
0000000000000000
0000000001010000 //movi Reg2
1111111100000000 //data
